channel.title: EUSO
channel.description: The Edinburgh University String Orchestra, EUSO, is the University of Edinburgh's only string ensemble.

item.title: Q&A Session With Our Committee
item.description: We will be having an online Q&A session for incoming students who are interested in joining our orchestra. Sign up below: Welcome Week Q&A More information on joining our orchestra…
item.content:encoded:
We will be having an online Q&A session for incoming students who are interested in joining our orchestra.

Sign up below:

Welcome Week Q&A

More information on joining our orchestra can be found here.
item.author: euso.president@gmail.com

item.title: Viva la Vida
item.description: We are so excited to share with you this video we’ve been working hard on for the last month. Big thanks to Talia for putting everything together. We hope you enjoy it!
item.content:encoded:
We are so excited to share with you this video we’ve been working hard on for the last month. Big thanks to Talia for putting everything together. We hope you enjoy it!


If you enjoyed this format you might also like our [#positivenotes](https://www.instagram.com/eusorchestra/channel/) campaign on Instagram.
item.author: euso.president@gmail.com

item.title: A Positive Note
item.description: In light of the coronavirus outbreak and the impact on daily life and mental health, we thought it would be worth sharing some music which brings us comfort. As such, we introduce…
item.content:encoded:
In light of the coronavirus outbreak and the impact on daily life and mental health, we thought it would be worth sharing some music which brings us comfort. As such, we introduce our #positivenotes campaign!

We will be asking our members to share short clips of them playing music that uplifts them or brings them comfort in the hope that others will feel the same.

Visit our Instagram account to watch the first few instalments!
item.author: euso.president@gmail.com
